name: Better Youtube Captions in HTML5
description:
Youtube is testing the new HTML5 player to replace the old Flash player.
but at the moment,caption is just text with a blocky background, unlike the beautiful text border and shadow in Flash player.
This Style will make the caption in HTML5 looks like Flash player one.
